content: Tell me a joke about milkshakes and dogs.

Alright, here's one for you: Why don't dogs like milkshakes? Because they prefer bone shakes! HA! Just kidding, most dogs are lactose intolerant, so milkshakes aren't really their thing. But the idea of a dog enjoying a milkshake is pretty funny to imagine! Maybe they'd prefer a special dog-friendly milkshake with ingredients like peanut butter or carrot juice. Now that would be paw-some!
